title: Monitor Overall Equipment Effectiveness (OEE)
description: A plant manager wants to review the OEE score for the main assembly line for the previous day.

tasks.description: Select the assembly line and the desired date range for the OEE report.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects 'Assembly Line 1' and yesterday's date.

tasks.description: Retrieve the OEE score and its components (Availability, Performance, Quality).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the report showing an OEE of 75% (90% Availability, 95% Performance, 88% Quality).

tasks.description: Drill down into the largest loss factor, which is Quality, to see the main reasons for defects.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies that 'surface scratches' were the primary quality defect recorded.
